original_title: Roanoke: Search for the Lost Colony
overview: For over 400 years, the disappearance of 117 colonists from Roanoke Island has been Americaâ€™s oldest mystery. Now, a mysterious stone inscription may lead to uncovering the truth. Expert stonemasons Jim and Bill Vieira team up with maverick archaeologist Fred Willard to investigate the mystery and find out what happened to the lost colony.
title: Roanoke: Search for the Lost Colony
